concept.title: Page Viewed by Key Visitors Report
concept.shortdesc: Deprecated with the release of version 15. If this functionality is required within your organization, consider creating processing rules to populate variables based on domain or IP address.

conbody.p: This report lists all of the pages of your web site that have been visited by the key visitors you have specified. Key visitors are defined by entering the domain or IP address of the groups you would like to track.
You can use this report to:

ul.li: Find your Pages for your key visitors
Identify important pages that are getting missed so you can highlight them more prominently
Measure page views to promotional, sign up, or order pages for marketing effectiveness
Highlight promotions, news, ads, etc. specifically tailored to those visitors

conbody.p: If this report is not available in the default location, please check with your administrator, who may have changed the default menu structure to better serve your organization's unique needs.
